definition: buffer/to cushion/to adjust to sharp changes
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

pinyin: gao1 su4 huan3 chong1 cun2 chu3 qi4

sentences.english: The chapter 3 focused on the hydraulic damping system.
sentences.chinese: 第三章着重分析研究了冲裁缓冲系统。

sentences.english: Creates a new input stream with the specified decompressor and buffer size.
sentences.chinese: 用指定的解压器和缓冲区大小创建一个新的输入流。

sentences.english: Electrophosresis in discontinuous buffer system was applied for the presenting patterns and fractions of the pancreatic amylase isoenzymes.
sentences.chinese: 应用不连续缓冲系统薄膜电泳法行酶谱分析。

sentences.english: Running shoe built for the neutral to under-pronator who requires an enhanced cushioning.
sentences.chinese: 跑鞋建中立副旋者需要增加缓冲。

sentences.english: The same logic used to load the register is used to enable the tri-state buffers instead.
sentences.chinese: 装载寄存器的逻辑同样用于使能三态缓冲器。

sentences.english: The paper can provide some academic bases for buffer technology to deal with non-point pollution.
sentences.chinese: 并为缓冲带技术处理面源污染，提供一定的理论依据。

sentences.english: The Paper once again introduces the parameters of the buffer circuits of a new solid-state current limiter.
sentences.chinese: 再次论文介绍了新型固态限流器缓冲电路参数的计算。

sentences.english: The so-called security zone is in the buffer zone between South and North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的联安全地带，也就是在南北韩之间的缓冲地带。

sentences.english: When the buffer is empty, the transport layer is responsible for refilling it.
sentences.chinese: 当缓冲空了，传送层负责再装满它。

sentences.english: Latex and cork blend footbed offers increased cushioning and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 乳胶和软木混合鞋垫提供更多的缓冲和舒适。

sentences.english: Buffer overflows are the cause of many a security bug.
sentences.chinese: 缓冲区溢出是许多安全性问题的起因。

sentences.english: Most newer cars have air bags in front of and next to the seats.
sentences.chinese: 大多数较新的汽车在座位前方和旁边都有装缓冲气袋。

sentences.english: J is nearlly on his way here. I really need to take a break from those things.
sentences.chinese: 我真的需要过个年缓冲一下我紧张的神经了。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the mechanical and physical properties of standard size custom-made mouthguard.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究标准型定制类牙托对于外力打击的缓冲能力。

sentences.english: The buffer pool hit ratio is now showing excellent results.
sentences.chinese: 现在的缓冲池命中率就显示了较好的结果。

sentences.english: The brakes let go and the car crashed through the bushes at the edge of the town common, gathering speed.
sentences.chinese: 刹车松开了，汽车碾过了镇边缓冲速度的绿化栏。

definition: crack/gap between two objects/gap in time between two events
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
(of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape/(fig.) to rebound/to bounce back
to defer/to postpone/to put off/to retard/to slow sth down
(physics) inertia/(fig.) force of habit/tendency to do things in the accustomed way/habitual
